abstract: Keyword-driven ads can be an inexpensive way for entrepreneurs to publicize their products, but planning is everything.
snippet: Keyword-driven ads can be an inexpensive way for entrepreneurs to publicize their products, but planning is everything.
lead_paragraph: It used to be that business owners often struggled to afford advertising for their products or services. Google AdWords has changed that by offering an inexpensive way to spread the word. But if you don’t do some careful planning, you can easily find yourself spending thousands of dollars with little to show for it.

headline.main: Real-Life Lessons in Using Google AdWords
headline.print_headline: Real-Life Lessons in Using Google AdWords
